meanings.sent1: The red apple is unlike the green one.
meanings.sent2: Her dress is unlike anything I've seen before.
meanings.sent3: It was unlike him to arrive late to the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The quiet library was unlike a bustling market.
meanings.sent5: The strange creature looked unlike anything from this world.

meanings.definition: Not typical or characteristic of; not typical of.
meanings.sent1: His behavior was unlike his usual self.
meanings.sent2: The weather today is unlike the usual sunny days.
meanings.sent3: It was unlike her to forget her keys at home.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room was unlike anything they had experienced before.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the exotic fruit was unlike anything they had ever tried.
